title: "Booster" Ruins roles in champion select then AFK's
body:
Went into champion select for this game, was immediately asked "I'm boosting please let me Leblanc mid" with a linked profile. I said no wanting to play my own role. He proceeded to troll the entire champion select and after we got into game, AFK'd from around 3 minutes.

Above are the screenshots from the champion select and the AFK in the middle of the game. 
People like this shouldn't be allowed to play at all.

Cheers in advance Riot.

replies.body:
I've had one person in my entire experience in League of Legends, actually play like they were highly skilled when they claimed they were a smurf, and that was yesterday, and they were a mouthy prick about it too. Otherwise every single person who claims to be a "smurf/booster" has proceeded to play as bad if not worse than all the bronze/silvers/etc.. i've ever seen.

It's always bullshit and I wish there was a way to get people punished for having egos like Mohammad Ali when they are about as amazing as a wet sack of celery.
